rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家在实验室开发出第一个耐用的人类唇细胞模型我们用嘴唇说话、吃饭、喝水和呼吸；它们象征着我们的情感、健康和审美。它需要复杂的结构来发挥如此多的作用，因此嘴唇问题很难有效修复。基础研究对于改进这些治疗方法至关重要，但到目前为止，使用唇细胞的模型 -;与其他皮肤细胞的表现不同-；尚未可用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Scientists-develop-first-durable- human-lip-cell-models-in-the-lab.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Scientists-develop-first-durable- human-lip-cell-models-in-the-lab.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=29471465-55cd-4797-9aa5-b8c1269581f3 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 00:57:14 -0500 Scientists develop first durable human lip cell models in the lab
体重耻辱阻碍了多囊卵巢综合征女性的有效治疗莫纳什大学领导的一项系统评价发现，多囊卵巢综合症（PCOS）的生活方式管理需要减少体重耻辱，因为对于一些患有这种病的人来说，过度关注减肥可能会对他们的心理健康和福祉产生负面影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Weight-stigma-hinders- effective-treatment-for-women-with-PCOS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Weight-stigma-hinders- effective-treatment-for-women-with-PCOS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=375b3d51-7c32-4af1-afac-94f487c9ca0c Mon, 04 Nov 2024 00:48:00 -0500 Weight stigma hinders effective treatment for women with PCOS
研究揭示澳大利亚母亲在受孕护理方面的差距莫纳什大学领导的团队的一项新研究发现，一些澳大利亚母亲认为在怀孕期间进行个人医疗保健是令人困惑、不一致且难以获得的。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-reveals-gaps-in-interconception-care-for-Australian-mothers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-reveals-gaps-in-interconception-care-for-Australian-mothers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0a007022-bf57-4ae0-bce8-8fa0d6fe2ce5 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 00:45:00 -0500 Study reveals gaps in interconception care for Australian mothers
Alimetry 获得 1800 万美元资金用于推进可穿戴式肠道健康监测Alimetry 已筹集了超额认购的 1800 万美元 A2 轮融资，以将其可穿戴肠道健康监测设备商业化，利用越来越多的美国医院采用该设备的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Alimetry-secures-2418-million-to-advance-wearable-gut-health-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Alimetry-secures-2418-million-to-advance-wearable-gut-health-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51d85b62-1e8a-4eb7-9d4c-1ac2dbfa5e49 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 00:41:00 -0500 Alimetry secures $18 million to advance wearable gut health monitoring
碳酸酐酶抑制剂可清除 tau 蛋白病斑马鱼模型中的 tau 蛋白积聚一种常用于治疗青光眼的药物已在斑马鱼和小鼠体内被证明可以防止 tau 蛋白在大脑中积聚，这种蛋白会导致各种形式的痴呆症，并与阿尔茨海默病有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Carbonic-anHydrase-inhibitors-clear-tau-build-up-in-zebrafish-models-of-tauopathies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Carbonic-anHydrase-inhibitors-clear-tau-build-up-in-zebrafish-models-of-tauopathies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e2bb6b22-e9a0-4e78-a76e-901b66cddfcb Mon, 04 Nov 2024 00:29:00 -0500 Carbonic anhydrase inhibitors clear tau build-up in zebrafish models of tauopathies
研究发现 80 个与乳腺癌风险增加相关的基因乳腺癌是西方女性最常见的恶性肿瘤，高达 10% 的病例归因于基因变异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-identizes-80-genes-linked-to-increased-risk-of-breast-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/Study-identizes-80-genes-linked-to-increased-risk-of-breast-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4f66d2d1-6889-4861-bb83-06d5a539e737 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 00:22:00 -0500 Study identifies 80 genes linked to increased risk of breast cancer
新成像工具分析细胞外囊泡以追踪癌症进展罗彻斯特大学的一个研究小组报告了一种通过“液体活检”检测癌细胞的新方法，该方法比现有方法更简单、更快速、信息更丰富。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-imaging-tool-analyzes-extracellular-vesicles-to-track-cancer-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/New-imaging-tool-analyzes-extracellular-vesicles-to-track-cancer-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9ecf840-7e23-4ff5-ac35-ac0fd6ecf1e1 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 00:07:02 -0500 New imaging tool analyzes extracellular vesicles to track cancer progression
SpaceX CRS-31 支持心脏健康、神经退行性疾病和学生科学由国际空间站（ISS国际空间站）国家实验室赞助的超过25个有效载荷，包括技术演示、太空制造、学生实验以及美国国家科学基金会（NSF）资助的多个项目，将运往轨道前哨站。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/SpaceX-CRS-31-supports-heart-health-neurodegenesis-and-student-science.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241104/SpaceX-CRS-31-supports-heart-health-neurodegenesis-and-student-science.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4203f553-5b27-46ed-b47f-62a9efd5d853 Mon, 04 Nov 2024 00:01:59 -0500 SpaceX CRS-31 supports heart health, neurodegeneration, and student science
罕见的神经嵴干细胞被确定为细胞重编程的关键驱动因素由多伦多大学研究人员领导的一个团队发现，位于皮肤和身体其他部位的一组细胞，称为神经嵴干细胞，是其他研究人员发现的重新编程神经元的来源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241103/Rare-neural-crest-stem-cells-identified-as-key-drivers-of-cellular-reprogramming.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241103/Rare-neural-crest-stem-cells-identified-as-key-drivers-of-cellular-reprogramming.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d44c24fe-15e4-4a9d-90f3-ef46f80f4f70 Sun, 03 Nov 2024 23:54:25 -0500 Rare neural crest stem cells identified as key drivers of cellular reprogramming
单细胞研究鉴定促转移细胞亚群神经母细胞瘤（NB）是儿童中最常见的颅外实体瘤，由于其转移性和高度异质性而带来了重大的治疗挑战。最近的一项利用单细胞 RNA 测序 (scRNA-seq) 的研究揭示了 NB 进展和转移的重要分子机制，揭示了潜在的治疗靶点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241103/Single-cell-study-identizes-pro-metastatic-cell-subpopulations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241103/Single-cell-study-identizes-pro-metastatic-cell-subpopulations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c3b56e0-74a0-468f-bd7d-97f0c7331e2d Sun, 03 Nov 2024 23:46:06 -0500 Single-cell study identifies pro-metastatic cell subpopulations
